version_description:
•Brand new 4 week programs tailored to your goals and ability
•Reduced download size, with individually downloadable workouts, saving you 500+MB.  
•The option to track your program runs with Nike+ Running
•New customization options to create the right workout for your body 
•A premium new design that’s faster and easier to use

Updated rewards to display the full collection of program trophies you can achieve.
- A progress bar to tell you how many workout minutes you need to achieve your next milestone.
- Easier access to your favorite workouts.
- Alerts to tell you when downloads have paused.
- Enhanced design and navigation experience when creating a program.
- Bug fixes and  enhancements.

- Dual Screen (Beta Feature). Stream N+TC workouts from your phone to the TV using AirPlay or an HDMI Cable for iPhone 5 and above. 

- Bug fixes and enhancements 

Note: We are aware that Programs are ending prematurely for some users, and we are working towards a fix. Follow up with @nikesupport on Twitter for a workout recommendation to keep you moving in the meantime.

- Dual Screen. Stream N+TC workouts from your phone to the TV using AirPlay or an HDMI Cable for iPhone 5 and above.

- Corrected saving and retaining program progress

- Bug fixes and enhancements

Enhancements and bug fixes, including a fix for music and audio cues during workout.

Also in the 4.0 release:
•A Nike+ Profile, so you can add friends and see your training stats.
•A Nike+ Training Club feed to get motivation from trainers, athletes and friends.
•Take on the Workout of the Week and conquer new challenges.
•Take photos, customize them and share your workouts.
•New navigation design for easy access your N+TC essentials. 
•NikeFuel earned automatically syncs to your Nike+ Profile.
•Bug fixes and enhancements.

•Automatic syncing connects your N+TC app to Apple’s Health app. 
•See more posts on your Nike+ Training Club feed with every scroll.
•Other minor improvements.

WHAT’S NEW IN 4.2


Syncing Programs
Access up-to-date Program activity and user history across all your devices.


Support for Arabic
Use the app in Arabic. Supported in UAE, Bahrain, Lebanon, Kuwait, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Oman locales.

WHAT’S NEW IN 4.2


Syncing Programs
Access up-to-date Program activity and user history across all your devices.


Support for Arabic
Use the app in Arabic. Supported in UAE, Bahrain, Lebanon, Kuwait, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Oman locales.

YOUR FIRST WORKOUT
Find a workout that suits your level and ability, whether you’re a pro or new to the fitness world. 

POPULAR WORKOUTS
With this new category, access a selection of the most popular workouts.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

•100+ great all-new workouts designed by Nike Athletes and Trainers.
•Weekly featured workouts
•All-new personalized training plans that adapt to you

•New design featuring 100+ great all-new workouts designed by Nike Athletes and Trainers.
•Weekly featured workouts
•All-new personalized training plans that adapt to you
•Easy post-workout sharing

•New design featuring 100+ great all-new workouts designed by Nike Athletes and Trainers.
•Weekly featured workouts
•All-new personalized training plans that adapt to you
•Easy post-workout sharing

- Easily find NTC Classic workouts
- New Workouts added, including Yoga
- Bug fixes and enhancements

- Get workout recommendations for your level 
- Try new workouts designed by Nike Athletes and Trainers, added regularly
- Bug Fixes and enhancements

- Fix for the connection error
- Get workout reminders when you're in a Training Plan
- Get notified when there is a new Featured Workout
- Bug Fixes and other improvements

Working out just got easier:
• SEARCH 130+ workouts by workout name, body part, good for, equipment, drill, athlete and trainer
• BROWSE workouts quickly with search results that highlight duration, level and if equipment is required
• FILTER workouts by level, duration, equipment, intensity, type and focus
• RECOMMENDATIONS updated daily, just for you

Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and enhancements

We’ve been busy. Check out what’s new: 
- Adjust our audio cues (full, basic, none) and power through your workout with little to no interruption 
- Set your equipment preferences during the plan set-up so you never miss a workout on account of not being prepared 
- Easily see more details of a workout before starting it by pressing and holding the workout in list view (available on iPhone 6S/7 – iOS10 or higher) 
- Find your crew with our mutual friend recommendations 
- Additional bug fixes and enhancements

We’ve all been there. You set up your training plan only to have life get in the way. Well, now it doesn’t have to. Edit your preferences without starting over at any time: 
•  Change the equipment you have available 
•  Update the number of workouts you want prescribed each week 
•  Add/remove running 
•  Adjust the difficulty level 

Keep tabs on yourself with our improved Benchmark workout experience:
•  See how the Benchmark you’ve just completed compares with the last 
•  See how you match up against the community
•  Check out your progress over time in your Activity History

And we’ve also done some spring cleaning (i.e. additional bug fixes and enhancements). 

Lastly, a note to our users still on iOS 9 - Our 5.4 release is the last version that will support any phones still on iOS 9. The good news is that if you upgrade to iOS 10 today, you’ll ensure you have the best NTC experience going forward.

Friends don’t let friends miss a workout. Now with our improved friend search you can find all your Facebook friends who are also using the NTC app.

And like any athlete, we’re always focusing on improving the little things to maximize our performance.

Yoga is back! 

NTC Yoga is the perfect complement to (or pillar of) any holistic training plan, with workouts covering strength, flow, and restorative. Featuring our master yogis, these flows are built to guide you through essential poses to advance your practice. 

And like any athlete, we’re always focusing on improving the little things to maximize our performance.

Namaste.

Complete our Cristiano Ronaldo-inspired workouts to unlock a special challenge featuring the man himself.

Already done his quick-hit workouts? Check your inbox for instructions on how to access the challenges.

And like any athlete, we’re always focusing on improvements to maximize our performance.

NOW AVAILABLE ON APPLE WATCH 
Focus more on your workout and less on your phone with NTC’s new Apple Watch experience:

• Easily control your workout – advance to the next drill, pause, skip drills, and more, directly from your wrist
• Monitor your heart rate, calories and Exercise ring progress
• Haptic guidance to stay on track with less distractions
• Workout recommendations to help you hit your Exercise goal

Simply update to the latest version and start a workout from your phone. NTC on Apple Watch requires iOS 11.0 or later and watch OS 4.0 or above.

And, like any athlete, we’re always focused on improvements to maximize our performance.
Like any athlete, we're always focusing on improvements to maximize our performance.
Like any athlete, we’re always focusing on improvements to maximize our performance.

Check out what’s new:
• You asked, we listened! Now you can skip drills any time throughout your workout.
• Having trouble mastering a drill? Pause anytime in your workout to review the movement.
• View workouts the way you want to—video now plays in both portrait and landscape. Try it on your TV using AirPlay.
• Easily find your favorite ab and glute workouts in the new ‘Browse by Muscle Group’ section on the Workouts tab. 
• Our workout ‘Picks For You' are now located on the Featured tab. The more you train, the more personalized your recommendations become.
• New workouts and drills to help you get ahead of your 2018 fitness goals, including: 
    Super Twist Core Series
    Glute and Hip Strength 
    Boxer Arms
    Boxer Core
    Boxer Burner
• We’ve also made bug fixes and improvements, including support for iPhone X.

INTRODUCING WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Reaching your goals just got easier! NTC’s new Workout Collections deliver curated workouts and expert advice to help you focus your routine and make progress. Great for all levels.

Try one of our new Collections:
Get Leaner Stronger Abs
Get Strong to Get Toned
Learn the Basics

All-New NikePlus Member Unlocks
Check out your Profile for member-only benefits, including access to exclusive products, expert product guidance and unique Nike experiences.

And like any athlete, we're always focusing on improvements to maximize our performance.
Like any athlete, we're always focusing on improvements to maximize our performance.

Now introducing 2 new features: Nike Training Club Premium and Workout Reminders!
 
NIKE TRAINING CLUB PREMIUM
Reaching your fitness goals just got easier. We’ve partnered with world renowned Nike Master Trainers to deliver their results-focused workouts and programs, straight to you. Subscribe now and get access to:
• 4-6 Week Programs Led by Nike Master Trainers
• Expert Nutrition & Wellness Guidance Including Mindset, Recovery, and Sleep
• New Workout Formats Including On-Demand Classes and Whiteboard Workouts for Gym-style Training
Apple Watch support for new NTC Premium Workout formats coming soon.
 
WORKOUT REMINDERS
You asked, we listened! Set reminders to help you stay motivated.
 
And, like any athlete, we’re always focused on improvements to maximize our performance.

In addition to our 180+ free workouts, NTC Premium gives you access to two new workout formats – trainer-led classes and whiteboard workouts – now with improved tracking on Apple Watch. Find these new formats under Browse in the Workouts tab and start your workout from your phone to keep track of your heart rate and approximate calories burned right from your wrist.


And, like any athlete, we’re always focused on improvements to maximize our performance.

Here’s what you’ll find in our latest update:
NEW WAYS TO SHARE WORKOUTS
Motivate friends to train with you by sharing workouts before you start them! To share, tap the share icon in the upper right-hand corner of any workout detail screen. 

NEW YOGA PROGRAM 
Move better and feel better with our latest Premium Program, ‘Yoga Flex & Flow’ where Nike Master Trainers Alex Silver-Fagan and Branden Collinsworth lead you through a 4-week journey of yoga workouts, guided meditations, and nutrition & wellness guidance.

TRAIN LIKE THE MVP
Improve your power, speed, and agility with a new basketball-inspired Workout Collection featuring Giannis Antetokounmpo.

INTRODUCING ACHIEVEMENTS
Celebrate your personal progress with new badges and trophies in NTC. You can earn Achievements by completing workout milestones like your first workout, training multiple times per week, weekly streaks, and more. Check out your new trophy case in the Activity tab. See what you’ve earned, share with friends, and set your sights on your next goal.

Stick to your 2020 goals with the BREAKTHROUGH CHALLENGE! Complete 20 workouts in 28 days with our latest program in NTC Premium. Join five Nike Master Trainers as they take you through a fun mix strength, HIT & yoga sessions.
 
NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Make every minute count with a series of free, quick & efficient HIT workouts in the ‘Get the Most Sweat for Your Session’ Collection.
 
Focus on targeted areas with our most popular free workouts in the ‘Best of Abs, Arms and Glutes’ Collection.

You got this. Keep after your fitness goals, while we maximize our performance with bug fixes and improvements. New free and Premium workouts added regularly.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Done in Under 20 - Quick, convenient workouts for when you're short on time.
Big Workouts for Small Spaces - You don't need more than the area of a yoga mat to do these workouts.

We heard your feedback, active monthly minutes are back in your activity history.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Boost Your Mood - Upbeat workouts from speedy HIT sessions to relaxing sun salutations.

And, like any athlete, we’re always focused on improvements to maximize our performance.

NTC Premium is Free Until Further Notice

At Nike, our world is sport, but sport is not our whole world. 

As athletes*, we’re evolving as the world evolves and we want to help you stay healthy and active with your fellow teammates. Starting today and until further notice, we're giving free access to NTC Premium to everyone. Because now more than ever, we are all playing as one team.

NTC Premium is FREE. As athletes*, we’re evolving as the world evolves and we want to help you stay healthy and active with your fellow teammates. Starting today and until further notice, we're giving free access to NTC Premium until further notice. Because now more than ever, we are all playing as one team.
 
TRY THIS: 
Big Workouts for Small Spaces - You only need an area the size of a yoga mat for most of these workouts.

Make home the perfect place to stay active with the Nike Training Club app. Enjoy on-demand class-style workouts and programs you can do in any room, with any equipment. Put your wellness first with expert tips on nutrition, sleep, and more. 

NEW PREMIUM TRAINING PROGRAM
Try our new 6-week training program led by Kirsty Godso. A perfect blend of simple strength to build you up and upbeat cardio to make you feel the burn. Designed for the begininer but made for everyone.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Try our new workout Collection "For the Whole Family" for fun, kid-friendly workouts you can do together and "Rejuvenate with Yoga" to help you energize, strengthen, and restore.

NEW WORKOUTS
Try our new bodyweight Cardio Kick, Quick Fix Mobility and 12-minute: Arms & Abs workouts.

NEW PREMIUM TRAINING PROGRAMS
Ignite & Inspire with Kirsty Godso is a perfect blend of simple strength to build you up and upbeat cardio to make you feel the burn. Designed for the beginner but made for everyone.

Fitness Adventure with Brian and Bella is a 6-episode program in NTC hosted by 7-year-old Bella Nunez and her father, Nike Master Trainer, Brian Nunez. Geared towards kids ages 6-10, these fast, fluid, and fun fitness videos aim to motivate and entertain while helping kids get moving.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Try our new workout Collection "For the Whole Family" for fun, kid-friendly workouts you can do together and "Rejuvenate with Yoga" to help you energize, strengthen, and restore.

NEW WORKOUTS
Cardio Kick. Cardio doesn’t always have to be high-intensity of high-impact to be effective. Test your endurance with these movements made to elevate your heart rate without hammering your joints.

Strong Core & Cardio. Rev your metabolic engine with an at-home total-body endurance session that pays special attention to your core.

NIKE TRAINING CLUB PREMIUM IS FREE
Keeping healthy and active is one of the most important things. That's why all of the NTC Premium programs, workouts, and expert tips that our community has come to love will stay free for all Nike Members, for good.

As athletes*, we're evolving as the world evolves and we want to help you stay healthy and active with your fellow teammates. Because now more than ever, we are all playing as one team.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Try our new workout Collection "Mamba Mentality Challenge". Start and finish this collection of workouts with the new "Athletic HIT Benchmark" workout to see how you improve.

NEW TRAINER-LED PROGRAM
Advance with Joe Holder is a new program designed to take your strength and endurance to the next level. This 4 stage program features 24 challenging whiteboard workouts, as well as wellness advice across nutrition, recovery, and sleep for a holistic approach to training.

As athletes*, we're evolving as the world evolves and we want to help you stay healthy and active with your fellow teammates. Because now more than ever, we are all playing as one team.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS

NEW TRAINER-LED PROGRAM
Advance with Joe Holder is a new program designed to take your strength and endurance to the next level. This 4 stage program features 24 challenging whiteboard workouts, as well as wellness advice across nutrition, recovery, and sleep for a holistic approach to training.

NEW LOOK, SAME FEATURES
Experience the same class-style workouts, programs, and expert tips you've come to love for free — just without the label. Our "Premium" badges are going away, but you'll still be able to find your favorite content, right where you left it.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTIONS
Try our new workout collections Cross-Training to Master Your Class, Dynamic Warm-Ups for Athletes & Extra Credit After Cardio.

NEW WORKOUTS
Head to Toe HIT, a 33-minute high-intensity workout that will challenge your entire body. No equipment required.

NEW NTC FEED
A completely refreshed Feed gives you Nike coaching, expert wellness advice, and community content to help you reach your health & fitness goals.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTION
Our new Essential Yoga Flows for Every Day Collection features six quick, bite-sized yoga flows designed to energize, rejuventate, and restore. 

NEW YOGA WORKOUTS
Active Warm-Up Flow
Quick Cool-Down Flow
Anytime Athlete Recovery Flow
Simple Morning Energy Flow
Total-Body Refresh Flow
Easy Evening Unwind Flow

*UK ONLY*

AN EXCITING NEW APP UPDATE
In addition to the workouts you've come to love, we're giving you access to 115+ new class-style workouts, 9 results-oriented programs, and 200+ tips on nutrition and wellness from our world-renowned experts.

NEW WORKOUT COLLECTION
Cycle Sync Your Training, built in partnership with female-athlete physiologist Stacy Sims, PhD, includes 12 workouts and expert advice for all three phases of your cycle so you can make the most of them. 

NEW WORKOUTS
Speedy Core Circuit is a quick 12-minute, beginner-level ab workout that will challenge your core stability and conditioning. 

BOOKMARK YOUR FAVOURITE WORKOUTS
Did you know you can save workouts? Now you can tap the bookmark icon on each workout to add your favourite sessions to your saved workouts list.

NTC Live
Bring the class to you. Join Nike Trainers Live for weekly home-friendly HIT and Yoga workouts designed for all levels of fitness, no equipment required.

Surprisingly efficient, new beginner HIT and Yoga workouts make the most out of every minute.
Bug fixes and enhancements.

ACCESSIBILITY
Enabling all athletes* to seamlessly use NTC by making accessibility improvements on Voiceover and Talkback.

OUR COMMITMENT TO ACCESSIBILITY CONTINUES
In addition to making the app easier to navigate in general, you can now use the voiceover feature to guide you through a Whiteboard Workout.

OUR COMMITMENT TO ACCESSIBILITY CONTINUES
In addition to making the app easier to navigate in general, you can now use the voiceover feature to guide you through a Whiteboard Workout.

IMPORTANT: We have upcoming improvements for our login process across all Nike apps. Please make sure the email address associated with your Nike Profile is up to date. If it is not up to date, please edit your email address within Settings, or contact Customer Service by tapping 'Contact Us' in Settings. 

* Livestream Polling: Our livestreams are now interactive. When you join a livestream workout, you can use the new polling feature to share your opinions on NTC experiences. Our trainers, athletes and experts will pose questions about the workout and then share their thoughts in real-time. 

* Schedule Your Workouts: Keep yourself accountable by scheduling your saved workouts and setting workout reminders. Select a date and time, and we’ll send you notifications before your workout so you can get ready.

What’s New

* IMPORTANT: We have upcoming improvements for our login process across all Nike apps. Please make sure the email address associated with your Nike Profile is up to date. If it is not up to date, please edit your email address within Settings, or contact Customer Service by tapping 'Contact Us' in Settings.
* New Widget for iPhone: See your training at a glance. The new Saved Workouts widget gives you quick access to your favorite NTC workouts.

What’s New

* IMPORTANT: We have upcoming improvements for our login process across all Nike apps. Please make sure the email address associated with your Nike Profile is up to date. If it is not up to date, please edit your email address within Settings, or contact Customer Service by tapping 'Contact Us' in Settings.
